alert.note: Alert for Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 3:21PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Goshen County through 345 PM MDT... At 320 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Yoder, or 7 miles southwest of Torrington, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Torrington, Yoder, Huntley and Veteran. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
